snippet.title: Automata Break | STEAM Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
We heard our community and we changed from Kickstarter to Steam Early Access :D 
Thanks for the Support Guys 🤩(I'm going to leave this GIF here and walk away slowly.... https://bit.ly/2GUDfwt)

This will be Live on September 18th! This Friday! 

And if you still want one of the tiers we offered on Kickstarter, check out our website Store! 
http://www.phgamestudio.com/automatabreak/store.html 
(Powered By Humble Bundle)
Stay tunned!
____________________________________________
Automata Break is a VR Asymmetrical Multiplayer Tower Defense FPS
It will be on Early Access on September 18! 🤖

👾 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1322010/Automata_Break/

🦾 Want to be part of the project? 
http://www.phgamestudio.com/automatabreak/store.html 

📣 Join us on Discord to share your opinion with us and hang out: https://discord.gg/ZRcdzpj
